sense.def:
To suggest something
pomeni povedati načrt ali zamisel nekomu, da jo pretehta.

seg.quote: We have to suggest a list of possible topics for next term's seminars.
Can you suggest somewhere for a short holiday?
I'm not suggesting that the accident was your fault.

sense.def:
Kadar ena stvar
suggests another
, zaradi nje lahko sklepamo, da je nekaj drugega res.

seg.quote: His expression suggested pleasure at the fact that I had come.
The forecasts suggest that there will be higher unemployment.
